Leave SOP to No.3 platform over footbridge along to No.6 platform to Collier Lane Sidings.
Leave Station from Wood Street entrance. Water Street. Robert Street. Crown Street. to the Bog roadway entrance to the rear of the Power Signalbox.
Leave SOP via platform No.3 and Wood Street entry along staff car park to West Sidings via Cattle Dock steps.
Charlotte Street. Nelson Bridge. subway to station rear.
Entry from the station forecourt to the main station entrance. this via the Up platform to the staff messroom. Access to the Down platform is via the subway.
ACCESS PUBLIC AREA DOWN PLATFORM FROM MAIN STREET. WALK PAST SIGNAL BOX BUILDING AND TURN RIGHT AT THE END AND WALK UO STEPS
Through yard gate on up side. cross the sidings and main lines by the boarded walkway to signalbox on down side.
ACCESS UPSIDE WICKET GATE, WALK ALONG WALKWAY IN UP CESS TO CROSSING CABIN.
Through wicket gate on downside. cabin on down side.
WALK FROM PLATFORM 1/2 TOWARDS END OF PLATFORM BY SEMAPHORE SIGNALS. CROSS BAY LINE USING WALKING BOARDS AND WALK THROUGH CAR PARK TO SIGNAL BOX.
TURN LEFT ON PLATFORM 1 AND WALK TO SOUTH END TO REACH CARRIAGE SIDINGS
CROSS RUNNING LINES BY MEANS OF FOOT BRIDGE
Enter the railway premises through the wicket gate in the up side railings.

Enter via the station gate and proceed along No.1 platform to bottom of the platform ramp. cross over the bay line then along the walkway to a point opposite the permanent way cabin. turn left and gain access to signalbox via doorway adjacent to PW cabin.
ACCESS THROUGH GATE AND FOLLOW MADE PATH TO STAFF ONLY FOOT CROSSING. CROSS ALL LINES QUICLY WHILST LOOKING OUT FOR TRAINS. FOLLOW PATH AROUND BACK OF SIGNAL BOX TO REACH STEPS
Leave SOP to No.3 platform over footbridge along to No.4 platform. main entrance. turn right along car parking area. Access via gate to Collier Lane Sidings.

ACCESS WORKINGTON DOWN PLATFORM THROUGH MAIN ENTRANCE TURN RIGHT, WALK NORTH TO END OF PLATFORM AND THROUGH GATE <16 KEY>. WALK TOWARDS FOOT CROSSING AND THEN FOLLOW WALKING BOARD AROUND SIGNAL BOX TO STEPS AND DOOR. BEWARE OF TRAINS ON THE CLOSEST LINE <

ENTER MARYPORT PLATFORM VIA MAIN ENTRANCE. TURN RIGHT AND PROCEED ALONG THE PLATFORM. WALK OFF THE PLATFORM RAMP. TURN ;EFT AND STOP. LOOK BOTH WAYS. WALK ACROSS FOOR CROSSING TO REACH SIGNAL BOX STEPS.
Entry from roadway to gate at rear of signalbox and pathway to signalbox steps.

Exit Timperley Stn via overbridge.Cross Park Rd outside stn exit & walk along Canal Rd. facing station.Continue along Canal Rd for some 800 yards & then left onto Deansgate Lane.Walk across LC.small wicket gate in fence to rear of sigboxSteps to op.floor
Go through wicket gate and around rear of signalbox. no necessity to cross lines except by public level crossing.

If on up platform. cross over railway by steps and overbridge at the Chester end of station onto down platform. Walk along down platform in direction of Manchester. Steps to box operating floor lead from end of platform.

From Northwich Stn entrance via steps to Middlewich Rd. left along Middlewich rd & second left. dean St. follow Dean St & right turn into Bowden Dr. follow Bowden Dr round to left & proceed into residents garages compound.gateway rear of shunters messroom
Along up platform path leads straight to signalbox. Direct access also from former goods yard.
Access through gate in fence at back of signalbox off Holford Lane.
Wicket gate on up side. cross on sleeper crossing to cabin on down side.

From CSOP via staff car park to main gate.Follow footpath on left to gate at top of subway.Via subway to Plat No.2. along platform & cross the Dn Furness Gds Line South of the platform. then follow the line of the boundary fence to the holding sidings
From station car park. through gate in boundary fence at side of S&T workshops. across S&T yard to foot of signalbox steps.
Enter station via booking hall. cross over bridge to platform 3. Proceed along platform to boxed in walkway to signalbox.
Via steel access gate in fence. Carr Lane side of crossing and directly to box.
Via steel access gate on up side of track and directly to box.
From Moss Street through wicket gate to signalbox.
Path off Pimlico Road opposite signalbox. both running lines to be crossed.
Off East Lancs Road. into Higher Green Lane. Rindle Road. cross line on level crossing. Walk between crossing and signalbox. going behind signalbox to gain access to steps.

Access gained from Chapel St via Yorkshire Approach leading onto platform 18.Walkway runs parallel to Dn fast.for 15 yards. then turns at 90 degree angle and crosses the up and down slow and 2 roads which become sidings.The walk route joins vehicular path
Through gate at roundabout near M602. along new roadway then across lines to signalbox. Wear high visibility clothing.
From Tasker Terrace through gates of council refuse Depot. then through depot direct to signalbox.
Though gate on Midge Hall Lane. along walkway at rear of signalbox.
Through gate at roadside to up platform and signalbox.
Through gate on station road. along walkway at front of signalbox to steps.
From down platform along down side cess to ground frame direct.
From road at A.H.B. s using portable timber provided. cross trespass guards on up side of line. walk in up side cess to ground frame.
From Up platform direct via up side cess to Ground Frame.
Down escalator from Lime Street Main Line under subway LIme Street Low Level on right side.
Through booking hall. lifts along emergency platform No.2 to steps.

Exit station via public ramps and turn right onto Glazebrook Lane. If exiting from upside. cross railway bridge on Glazebrook Lane turning left into Carlton Way. continue along Carlton Way and on left there is a gap and a public footpath leads across a ri
Across overbridge in Weston Lane through gate on the up side along path to signalbox.
Through gate off Thomas Street along yard to signalbox.
Crewe Platform 12 south end gate slope. Cross multiple tracks/sidings to yellow access gate onto the TMD/Down Holding Sidings Roadway.
Access is via the car park at the rear of the station. through the gate in the fence to the signalbox steps.

Access Carriage Shed via footbridge over LEC5 WCML to Carriage Shed. Proceed south through Carriage Shed, cross left over multiple sidings and continue along roadway to North Stafford Jn, KCS1 Authorised Access Point, 7m 1540yds.

From the car park to access gate adjacent to UP platform, using wooden boards to cross both the UP and DOWN line, alongside DOWN line to foot of signal box steps. Access gate is to be kep padlocked at all times when not in use

Pedestrian: From station turn left up station road onto footpath adjacent to railway over bridge. enter railway by gate at rear of signalbox. Follow timber walkway to foot of steps. Vehicle: Parking on Station Road.
Enter railway by gate off Marsh Lane. Cross running lines by timber walkway to foot of signalbox.
Leave SOP and walk to South End of No.1 Platform. cross line using sleeper crossing and progress towards sidings adjacent to the Departure sidings.
Leave station from Court Square main entrance. Botchergate. London Road. to Tyne Street and private roadway past the Depot Engineer s Offices to the Maintenance Depot.
James Street. Nelson Bridge. Charlotte Street.
St Nicholas Bridge. Albion Street. Lancaster Street. Crown Street. Robert Street. Wood Street. James street. to main entrance for permission.
London Road. Botchergate. Crown Street. Robert Street. Wood Street. James Street. to main entrance for permission.
London Road. Tyne Street. Internal Road.
London Road. Tyne Street. Internal Road over road crossing. down side of entry siding.
Through wicket gate in Greendale Road. up steps to old fast lines and along footpath to signalbox. No necessity to cross lines.
Entrance from wicket gate in Grove Lane near bridge. Downs steps and along footpath to signalbox. No necessity to cross lines.

Pedestrian:Off Holly Oak Rd.through AALCo plc car park to steel wicket gate in boundary fence.cross over Up main line by walkboard.walk along pathway between Up & Down lines.when opposite signal box cross Down main line by walkboad to sigbox steps

Along plat to right of bay.to end of platform ramp.Right onto sleeper crossing over up platform and former up through lines.Left at end of crossing onto elevated wooden walkway under WCML Bridge & after passing under bridge back onto paved path to sdg acc
Along platform to left of bay to end of platform ramp. turn left and walk across sleeper crossing over down platform and former down through lines to step into car park.
From CSOP turn left towards London Street. Turn right into London Street and continue to end. Turn left into Derby Road. and right into access road to sidings.

From CSOP turn right and walk via station concourse and through ticket barrier to platforms. or through gate adjacent platform 6. Walk length of platform 1/2 and descend end ramp. Cross running line by barrow crossing into siding throat.
From A5209 along station road over the level crossing turn first right into cul de sac/ car park at the rear of the signalbox.
From Edge Hill Station. Up station approach. turn left at top along Tunnel Road. take first turning into gateway.
Walking route is via the side gate adjacent to Platform 1. and along platform 1 onto station concourse with access to sidings via the appropriate gate and steps facing sidings.
Down escalator from Lime street main line under the subway Lime street Low Level on the right side.

Through gate from roadside to Down Platform. cross via footbridge to Up Platform. along Up Platform to signalbox.
ENTER DOWN PLATFORM. TURN RIGHT. FOLLOW PLATFORM TO SIGNAL BOX STEPS
Cross main lines on Station Barrow crossing. walk between platforms and signalbox. between No.2 and No.3 platform lines.
Wicket gate on down side to signalbox on down platform.
Through wicket gate on up side. cabin on up side.
Public footpath from main road to gateway and stone steps behind signalbox.
Entry is from the roadway to the wicket gate on the down side direct to the signalbox steps.
Wicket gate on up side. cross on sleeper crossing to cabin on down side island platform.
Through yard gate on up side. walk to boarded walkway across up and down main lines to bottom of box steps.
Cabin on up platform. use main entrance.
Through wicket gate to cabin on down side.
Through wicket gate on up side. cabin on up platform.
Through wicket gate to cabin on down side.
Through yard entrance on down side. cross on boarded walkway over siding and main lines to signalbox steps.

Be sure to wear your high visibility vest <> Access gained from Wellington Rd. A6. turning into Bowerfold Ln.right off Bowerfold Ln into yard entrance.at bottom of entrance approach turn right into the yard.Then cross the dn slow & dn fast lines using the

For all staff NOT holding track safety certificates RT3171: Leave station forecourt and turn right into Botchergate, right onto Crown Street, cross road opposite Story Carpets, follow access road to PSB. Updated Ref: Terry Kershaw.

For all staff holding track safety certificates RT3171: Walk to south end platform 1. cross lines using sleeper crossing and progress toward PSB using safe cess. Proceed through access gate fitted with no. 16 padlock. Updated Ref: Terry Kershaw.
From public road through gate and up the steps to box.
Access through gateway at former Halton Station yard. along pathway and cess of up loop line on up side. Cross up and down lines opposite signalbox.
Turn off Station Lane into old station yard. proceed to a point opposite signalbox. Cross to signalbox by means of walkboards.
Access through wicket gate leading from former station yard. Cross down and up lines. proceed along cess on up side to signalbox.

Turn left at car park entrance along private road to Slutchers Lane. turn right and then first left along public footpath through the Industrial Estate to Central Park Square. Cross the square and along Park Boulevard using the Blue Bridge to Chester Rd.

Turn right along Chester Road to Taylor Street. Turn right into Taylor Street and Eastford Road. Follow Eastford Road to a gated entrance on left hand side following roadway under railway bridge and up slope into Walton Yard.

Access to the Ground Frame is gained via the steps from the road overbridge to the up platform. along the up platform to the Manchester end where the ground frame is in a brick hut. A 442 key is required to gain entry.
By Car: Through car park to box. By Train: Walk through main station along car park to box.

Access to the signalbox from the front of the station is via the subway to platform 3. Entrance to the signalbox is situated at the South end of platform 3 access is gained via the side door. Access by prior arrangement tel 0161 228 8322.
From Station Road to the station entrance turn right through the car park following the road to the signalbox entrance.
Via DED Entrance. Kirkmanshulme Lane. Stockport Road. and Albert Road to Levenshulme Station.

Cross Wallgate by pedestrian crossing and turn right to Wigan North Western Station which is 50 yards on the left.

Entry from Wood Street entrance. Train Crew Locker Room and stairway to the Signing on Point located between Nos.1 & 3 platform. alternative access from Court Square the main station entrance. over the footbridge to No.3 platform.

Wood Street entrance. Water Street. Crown Street. Bog Roadway entrance to rear of box. for staff NOT in possession of a PTS certificate. OR: To south end of platform 1. cross lines and to Power Box. for staff IN possession of a PTS certificate.

From CSOP via staff car park to main gate.Follow footpath on left to gate at top of subway.Via subway to platform No.2 along platform & cross the dn Furness goods line south of platform. then follow the line of the boundary fence to the Loops
Leave SOP and walk to South end of No.1 platform cross lines using sleeper crossing and progress towards Sidings adjacent to Carlisle Power Signalbox.
From Hufling Lane along garage access road. Through the wicket gate and up the steps to box.
Through goods yard direct to box.
Through gate off station approach road. along path. turn right to foot of signalbox steps.
Guide Bridge Station. Guide Lane and along roadway past ACE Maintenance Depot.
Via footbridge. Hunters Lane. Hyde Road. Belle Vue Street. Gorton Lane and Pottery Lane to Ashburys Station.
From Station Road turn into former goods yard approach. Wicket gate gives access to boarded walkway crossing-up lines. then direct access to signalbox.
Access is gained from the south end of the platform.

Leave Stockport Stn via Stn Road. Edgeley side. left into Shaw Heath.right into Lowfield Rd.continue into Ashwood Rd.right into Stockholm Rd.right into Moscow Rd East.continue via BR Private r.bear right to cross Liverpool line by boaded crossing
From SOP via station approach. Rawlinson Street. Cavendish Dock Road. follow road to Woodbridge Haven. turn left and follow railway line.
From SOP via Station forecourt. Parcels Dock. using sleeper crossing over Dukes Siding then follow footpath to siding.
From SOP. No.1 Platform and Station subway to No.2 and 3 platforms.

From CSOP via staff/public car park to main entrance. turn left into Warton Road. follow along the road under both railway bridges to a gate on your left. on the Warton side of the River Keer. Then follow footpath to yard.

Along tarmacadam roadway between Allerton Station and The Allerton Hotel. Turn right at the maintenance sheds. over the concrete crossing and turn left into the shed. The traffic Supervisors office is situated on the left hand side of the shed.
Proceed through down wicket gate and across sleeper crossing over down and up lines. Turn right onto platform. signalbox steps on left hand side.
High Street. Egerton Road. Ashburton Road. Sherbourne Road. Hawthorne Road.

Exit station via public ramps and turn right onto Glazebrook Lane. If exiting from upside. cross railway bridge on Glazebrook Lane. Continue along Glazebrook Lane turning left after some distance into Carlton Way. Continue along Carlton way and on left th

Leave via Warwick Rd entrance along Warwick Rd.First left into Talbot Rd.first right into Great Stone Rd across Chester Rd to Avondale Rd.second left along Thornbury Rd.about 200 yards turn right into entry gate marked railway staff only.follow path acros
Via concrete path and sleeper crossing to MIFT or FLT.
1. via station entrance. over footbridge and along island platform to signalbox 2. From Speke Road via emergency access gate down slope and along dis-used platform to signalbox.

Left through car park via sleeper crossing to Staff & Admin building - right along Wilson Patten St to Bridge St.Continue through town centre onto Horsemarket St.At traffic lights continue into Winwick St & Central stn is on right
Enter through gate on Down side. cross on wooden walkway to signalbox.
From Warrington TCD. Staff Bus to Folly Lane. up steps. walkway to cabin.
Through station entrance. then under subway. Along down platform. then via paved path to signalbox.
Off Speke Road into Vineyard Street via private road under railway bridge over train crew crossing and via walkways to signalbox.
From Bootle Oriel Road Station. turn left into Oriel Road. turn left into Irlam Road then left onto Strand Road. Staff accommodation is located opposite the junction to Strand Road and Regents Road.
Through gateway in fence in MFI car park. for Signalbox and Per Way staff only.
Go to end of Tanhouse Lane by ICI gate house. then along dirt path leading to level crossing and on to signalbox.
Direct access to box from Marsh Lane.
Direct to box from Liverpool Road.
Along station road Penketh and proceed along roadway from Fidlers Ferry Crossing to Warrington.
Direct from Liverpool Road cross line to signalbox.

From CSOP via staff/public car park to main entrance. turn left into Warton Road. follow along the road to a gate on your right just before the second railway bridge. Then follow footpath to the signalbox.
Through gate at roadside. Warton Road. Up steps then along walkway to signalbox.

From Depot along roadway to yard entrance.Left at Yard Entrance & proceed up hill towards Peakdale.At Great Rocks Social Club.left into School Rd.Follow rd. -Ferndale Rd. until reaching T junction.Left down hill to bridge right through wicket gate dn st
Off road through Yard entrance along roadway to Timber Crossing over No.2 Cripple siding then along walkway to cabin.
Off Road through wicket gate in wall and down steps to rear of signalbox. Then along Boards via South Shops entrance of sidings then down sidings Reception Roads via Ground Frame to Cabin.
Along Wormold Road down steps to signalbox.
Across car park to Timber Crossing. over No.2 Cripple siding then along Tarmac Path to siding.

Off road. through yard entrance and along roadway to timber crossing over No 2 triple siding. tarmac path past cabins. across walkway opposite form tops cabin. follow cinder path and footboards to signalbox.
Turn off Main Rd. A49. by cattle market. then along approach road to a point opposite the signalbox. Across timber walkway to box.
Through E.T.E. yard direct to signalbox
From Warehouse Offices. Crewe Yard. Gresty Road. South Street. Oak Street. Wistaston Road.
From platforms 1.3.4 and 7 east end over timbered crossing along footpath to Lightfoot Street. through P.S.B. car park and wicket gate into compound.

Right when leaving CSOP to West end of plat.across sleeper crossing.right at bridge abutment.left under second arch.Pass through S&T yard.Left on leaving yard & cross tracks on sleeper crossing.Follow white lined walkway through old shed & over sleeper cr
Main entrance to station. Over footbridge and along platform No.4.
Leave Citadel station by minibus service operating from roadway between platforms 1 & 3 North end. alighting at the Down departure car park. through Wicket Gate to Down Sidings.

Old Hall Street entrance; as for Moorfields. at end of Moorfields cross Tithebarn street by pedestrian crossing. Then left down Tithebarn street to the traffic lights at the junction of Old Hall Street and Chapel street. turn right into Old Hall Street.

On leaving Ellesmere Port train crew booking on point turn left and follow the footpath until you reach the barrow board walkway.By use of the walkway cross rails and left into shunters cabin area.Gives access to shunters cabin and east end sdgs

Turn right into Stn Rd.walk along Stn rd approximately 200 yards to junction with Meadow Lane. right into Meadow Lane. along Meadow Lane turn into subway. walk through subway to Oil Sites road. walk approximately 300 yards. CSOP on right hand side
On leaving Ellesmere Port Station. on the down side. turn left into dead end road. the gateway on the right hand side gives access to Jake s sidings.
Walk down platform ramp on the Ellesmere Port down side in the direction of Hooton. follow the running rail passed Jake s sidings. on the right hand side. gaining access to west end sidings.
From Oil Sites Road to CSOP. turn right. then walk along cess in down sidings to walkway. the left to signalbox.
As per public access to station.
Via Station Road. turn left at the roundabout onto Chester Way. across Town Bridge. turn left up Castle Hill. turn right at Ryder Street to Queensgate and entrance gate to sidings.

Leave Citadel station by minibus service operating from roadway between platforms 1 & 3 North end. through Wicket Gate. Cinder Path. sleeper crossing over the exit line from Down departures. track side over bridge to path leading to Down departures Charge
From Corporation Road. across car park at side of Bigwigs club. enter railway through gate and turn left along disused trackbed to foot of signalbox steps. No necessity to cross lines.
Out of Allerton Station across duel carriageway straight up Horrocks Avenue. Cross over Long Lane into Woolton Road first right down Station approach.

Leave Castleton Stn Up approach.turn right proceed approx. 20 yards.cross Manc Rd & left into Heywood Rd.After approx 100 yards.through gates into CMD follow rd beyond Castleton East jcn sigbox & left over barrow crossing to shunters cabin. behind Pway ca

On leaving station turn right to traffic lights then turn left along Todmordan Road for approximately 1.5 miles. turn right down unmade road beside old Chemical Works to P.W. gate. go through gate. turn right. walk along the down side to Ground Frame.
Through gate off Heywood Road into CMD yard. follow path across sidings to signalbox. No necessity to cross lines.

From Todmorden Road walk between the houses along public footpath towards railway. cross over stream via bridge and walk along path to access gate. through access gate and climb steps to ground frame.

Access in Wood Street through old goods yard and DCE yard along side down main. No necessity to cross lines.  OLD SIGNAL BOX REMOVED AS PART OF ROCHDALE RESIGNALLING.  ACCESS CLOSED AS PART OF METROLINK WORKS
Entrance off Smithy Bridge Road behind signalbox. through wicket gate to steps. No necessity to cross lines. other than by level crossing.
Entrance from Moston Road through former coal yard. walk along down sidings and cross lines. at footboard crossing opposite signalbox. Wear high visibility clothing.
Leave station from Court Square main entrance. Botchergate. London Road to entrance to London Road Depot. turn left then bear right to portacabin approximately 30 metres away.
London Road to main entrance gate and obtain permission to works sidings.
London Road. Botchergate. Victoria Viaduct. Nelson Bridge. Charlotte Street.
From Devonshire Road. through gate. Along walkway to signalbox.
From Preston Station main entrance. public roads. Fishergate. pedestrian crossing. Bow Lane. Marsh Lane. double pedestrian crossing. Croft Street. through gates. entrance and up the steps to box.
Through gate at roadside. along lane to down side cess. cross timber crossing to upside. then to signalbox.
Along Grangeway and into Laburnam Grove leading to Rowan Close. thence via footpath alongside railway to gate opposite and giving access to wooden crossing to signalbox.
From Holloway through car park and direct to signalbox.
From Warrington TCD. Staff bus to Ditton Down Sidings car park. down steps adjacent to substation. across the track to down slow platform and along the platform to the sidings.
Along main road through old goods yard then along wooden walkway to signalbox.
From Hale Road via access road to Ditton sleeper Depot. through gateway and across footings to cinder path. along path and direct to signalbox.

Along tarmacadam roadway between Allerton Station and the Allerton Hotel. Turn right at the maintenance sheds. over the concretet crossing and turn left into the shed. The traffic Suypervisors office is situated on the left hand side of the shed.

Turn right at Skelhorne Street exit. across pedestrian crossing into Elliot Street. down left hand side of Elliot Street. first left into Great Charlotte. across the pedestrian crossing into Ranelagh Street. Turn right into station approach on the left.

Through F. & I. car park into Edington St.left into Tiverton St.Right into Picton Rd. after passing under the railway bridge turn right into Larkfield View.At the end of Larkfield View.through gateway up concrete path & over sleeper crossing to Supervisor

Up station approach into Tunnel Road at lights turn right into Picton Road. walk down Picton Road to the 147 Snooker Club. Turn left into Larkfield View go to gate at the top right hand side of Larkfield View. Downhill sidings.

Main Line bridge to Allerton Depot approach road. adjacent to Allerton Station. Depot approach road leads directly to Allerton Depot accommodation and shed.

The public and staff toilets within the station have their cisterns etc covered by panels. Operatives should be aware of the possible presence of sharps and biological hazards in these locations.

This is located to the side of Platform 9. The container is removed for emptying a few times per week. In this area there are electrical, hydraulic and also potentially biological hazards caused by the waste and possible presence of vermin.
